Module it.polimi.ingsw.am52
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am52.json

Class JsonDeserializer

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am52.json.JsonDeserializer
public class JsonDeserializer extends Object
Utility class with static methods for deserialization of json requests or responses.

  • Method Details

    • deserializeRequest

      public static JsonMessage deserializeRequest(String jsonText) throws IOException
      Parse a json text representing a request from the client and return the appropriate java object.
      Parameters:
      jsonText - The json text of the request.
      Returns:
      The java object of the request.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occur in the deserialization process.

    • deserializeResponse

      public static JsonMessage<BaseResponseData> deserializeResponse(String jsonResponse) throws IOException
      Throws:
      IOException

    • deserializeRequest

      private static JsonMessage deserializeRequest(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode jsonNode, String method) throws IOException
      Deserialize the jsonNode into the appropriate java request object.
      Parameters:
      jsonNode - The json node to deserialize.
      method - The method of the request.
      Returns:
      The java object of the request.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurs in the deserialization process.

    • deserializeResponse

      private static JsonMessage<BaseResponseData> deserializeResponse(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode jsonNode, String method) throws IOException
      Deserialize the jsonNode into the appropriate java response object.
      Parameters:
      jsonNode - The json node to deserialize.
      method - The method of the request.
      Returns:
      The java object of the request.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurs in the deserialization process.
